name: ZhanDou (VR and Non-VR)
description: Developed by KX Games, Zhandou is one of the first MOBA style games available on VR and Non-VR platforms. Along with Zhandou's unique theme, playable characters, environments, and fighting system, Zhandou will be the first game based on ancient Chinese civilization and mythology.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: window7 64bit Processor: 2.8GHz dual-core CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
